item.title: Arch Linux Troubleshooting
item.description: This post is a work in progress. I will try and register here tweaks I’ve used in order to solve glitches after a fresh Arch Linux install with the xfce desktop environment. Things are written in a Q&A fashion in no particular order (that is, in random order :)). xfce takes forever to start. clear the cache with rm -rf .config/ .cache/ .gnome* there is no internet. wpa_supplicant is missing.

item.title: about
item.description: I am a mechanical engineer turned software engineer. I’ve worked as a back-end developer and as a data scientist, and am currently pursuing a Master in Computer Science at the Institute of Mathematics and Statistics of the University of SÃ£o Paulo. My research project in on machine-learned encodings for multispectral astronomical images. * This website was built with Hugo and based on the Hermit theme.
